messages.text:
Looking at it. I'll see if I can get a fix submitted this afternoon.

> Netbsd is still failing after multiple attempts. Leaving it for someone with
> a Netbsd system.

blood of patriots & tyrants." --Thomas Jefferson

Hello golang-dev (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=18df6358619a ***

runtime: fix netbsd after reorg (again)

R=golang-dev
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7719046

Netbsd is still failing after multiple attempts. Leaving it for someone
with a Netbsd system.

subject: code review 7719046: runtime: fix netbsd after reorg (again)
